description: Unique identifier for the sequencing run
Public database run accession (e.g., NCBI SRA) if deposited
Associated experiment identifier, links to experiment table
Brief title/name for run
Summary or purpose of sequencing run
example: Non-human read run for sample OMS00001

description: Average read length (specify units)
Adapter sequences used
Original input raw read file name or ID
Total number of read pairs in the original file
Total number of bases pairs in the original file
Total number of reads not aligned to the reference(s)
File size of original read file (with units, e.g., MB, GB)
Checksum (e.g., MD5/SHA256) for original read file
Processed/non-human read file name or ID
Number of non-human read pairs
File size of non-human read file (with units)
Checksum for non-human read file
Date the sample was analyzed (YYYY-MM-DD, ISO 8601)
Reference genome version(s) used for human read detection
Microbial database(s) used for classification
Software (name & version) for human read detection
Software (name & version) for non-human read detection/classification
Sequencing base quality metrics
URL or name of data processing pipeline (with version/date)
Sequencing run control(s) used (e.g., spike-ins)
Data release status
Date of public/controlled release (YYYY-MM-DD, ISO 8601)
The (Illumina) instrument lane
